item.title: Update to REAK's PBX / IVR system
item.description: An update to the earlier blog post regarding the PBX / IVR System, Due to massive interest I’ve decided to make the asterisk config available publically.

item.title: How REAK operates it's IVR/PBX system for $7/mo
item.description: This is the story of how my company runs it’s own cloud PBX / IVR system for a really low running and setup cost, and how your startup or small business can benefit from it.
